data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_a7c51b517dbce49dac4e537bd4ab4f87.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Irithel and Leo's immaculate teamwork allows her to shoot while moving. Each Basic Attack will shoot 2 crossbow bolt(s) (but takes longer to refill) that deal <font color="fba51f"> (+55% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> per bolt (inherits a portion of Attack Effects).
Moving will build up <font color="a6aafb">Jungle Heart</font>, up to a maximum of 10 units, and cause the next Basic Attack to unleash 1 additional bolt(s).

Irithel launches a volley of arrows on the target area, dealing 330<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies within and reducing their Physical Defense by 15 for 3s.
Leo lets out a piercing roar, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slowing them by 40% for 2s.

Irithel orders Leo to leap in the target direction and empowers her crossbow for 10s. For the duration, she gains 30 Movement Speed and her Basic Attacks shoot enhanced crossbow bolts, dealing 120<font color="fba51f"> (+65% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target and nearby units. <font color="a6aafb">Jungle Heart</font> also accumulates faster for the duration.

data.name: Irithel

__data.skilldesc: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num2> extra Movement Speed and [C2Slow Immunity] for <Num1>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Gold Lane: Use Ultimate for high damage in teamfights and never stop moving.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+15% Extra Attack Speed
+16 Adaptive Attack
+5% Lifesteal

emblemskill.skilldesc: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s and restores 75-180 HP (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 8s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by <%Num2> for <Num1>s and restores <Num3> HP (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s and restores 75-180 HP (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 8s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Frenzy: Critical strikes grant 20% Attack Speed for 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Frenzy: Critical strikes grant 20% Attack Speed for 2s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+20% Lifesteal
+40 Extra Physical Attack
+15% Extra Attack Speed
+20% Crit Chance

equiplist.equipskill1: Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40% Crit Damage
+65 Extra Physical Attack
+25% Crit Chance

equiplist.equipskill1: Supreme Warrior: After casting an Ultimate, increase Movement Speed by 30% for 7.5s. This effect has a 15s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Supreme Warrior: After casting an Ultimate, increase Movement Speed by 30% for 7.5s. This effect has a 15s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+70 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+20% Crit Chance

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Malefic Energy: Increases Basic Attack range by 12%. When hitting a target, gains 10% Movement Speed for 0.5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Malefic Energy: Increases Basic Attack range by 12%. When hitting a target, gains 10% Movement Speed for 0.5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.

recommendmasterplan.name: The Prestige FARWAY
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: The forest hunter with a smilodon.

assist.desc: Irithel works best with heroes that can slow or provide hard CC such as Valir and Hylos because they allow her more opportunities to deal damage.

strong.desc: Irithel counters heroes with a shorter Basic Attack range than her or ones that lack mobility and can be easily kited, such as Miya and Alpha.

weak.desc: Irithel is countered by heroes with strong CC capabilities or can restrict movement, such as Badang and Silvanna. Because Irithel does not have any Blink skills, her advantage vanishes once her mobility is restricted.
